column4: i need to compile a piece of code on a box that is not connected to the internet. how can i get build-essential and all stuff onto it maintaining all dependencies?
build-essential and its dependencies are "probably" on the edgy distribution cd, change /etc/apt/source.list to point to the CD and install from there
will i find aircrack-ng on the edgy discs?
probably not, i believe aircrack-ng is in the universe repository, which won't be on the CD
